q1.question: How would you describe the texture of your hair?

choices.title: ExquisiteOil Strengthening Treatment
choices.description: Oil infused haircare provides many benefits to all types of hair. ExquisiteOil Strengthening Treatment is formulated with Polynesian Tamanu Oil for a ultra lightweight, scented oil that strenghtens thin, fragile hair.

choices.title: ExquisiteOil Protective Treatment
choices.description: Oil infused haircare provides many benefits to all types of hair. ExquisiteOil Protective Treatment is formulated with a Moringa oil blend, providing lightweight replenishment for all hair types.

choices.title: ExquisiteOil Softening Treatment
choices.description: Oil infused haircare provides many benefits to all types of hair. ExquisiteOil Softening Treatment is formulated with Tahitian Monoi, an exotic oil blend of Gardenia and Coconut, combining to make a rich, scented oil that provides ultimate softness to thick, coarse hair.

q2.q: Is your hair currently color treated?

q3.q: What is your primary hair concern?

choices.title: HYDRASOURCE Detangling Solution
choices.description: Dry hair can be prone to breakage and lacks manageability and shine. Inspired by the aloe plant that never seems to dry, Biolage HYDRASOURCE Detangling solution for dry hair helps optimize moisture balance for healthy looking hair.

choices.title: VOLUMEBLOOM Shampoo
choices.description: Fine hair lacks volume and can be difficult to style. Inspired by nature's expanding cotton flower, Biolage VOLUMEBLOOM Shampoo plumps fine hair with long-lasting bouncy volume.Give her hair 70% more volume after just one application*.

choices.title: Color Last
choices.description: Forget about de-saturated color. These state-of-the-art formulas and color-treated hair care products, inspired by nature, help protect hair, balance moisture and even out the hair’s surface for saturated, shiny, vibrant color that stays truer.

choices.title: SMOOTHPROOF
choices.description: Suelta el cabello encrespado y el volumen no deseado con las fórmulas más modernas inspiradas por la naturaleza que imitan las propiedades de la flor camelia que resiste el agua.  Las formulas trabajan para encapsular al cabello y alinear la cutícula para evitar la entrada de la humedad para mejor control y suavidad hasta en tiempo de 97% de humedad. Cuando se usa el sistema del champú, acondicionador y suero SMOOTHPROOF vs. un champú no acondicionador.

q4.q: What do you need when styling?

products.title: Freeze Fix Anti-Humidity Hairspray
products.description: The ultimate humidity-resistant, water-free fast-dry spray that lifts and locks styles into place with all-day firm and aerial support. Provides firm-hold for an all-day hold.

products.title: Complete Control Fast-Drying Hairspray
products.description: A fast-drying hairspray that delivers adjustable control while adding body and volume to finish any natural looking style. Soft- to medium-hold formula leaves hair flexible and natural-looking.
